basic_info.description: üéì I've just wrapped up my Master's in Software Engineering at Arizona State University, building on my Computer Science roots from PES University.
basic_info.descriptionline2: üñ•Ô∏è My journey through academia and 3 enriching years at Akamai Technologies has sharpened my knack for crafting innovative software solutions that enhance user experiences and streamline operations.
basic_info.descriptionline3: üíï I'm passionate about turning complex challenges into seamless solutions, making technology work smarter and lives easier. Let's build something amazing together! üíú

projects.title: Game Night Recommender
projects.description: Blending my love for gaming with my technical skills, I developed a personalized game recommendation system that leverages social connections to enhance group play experiences. This project is a testament to my ability to integrate complex APIs and deliver tailored solutions.

projects.title: Snake Programming Language
projects.description: Designed a novel Python-inspired language with a tokenizer, evaluator, parser, and semantic analyzer, ensuring cross-platform compatibility on MacOS and Windows.

projects.title: Fetal Monitoring - Patent
projects.description: Engineered a cost-effective hardware prototype with audio processing for third-trimester fetal monitoring, achieving a 98% cost reduction compared to traditional ultrasound.

education.title: Master of Science, Software Engineering
education.description: Advanced my expertise in software engineering with a focus on practical and theoretical aspects of the software development life cycle, culminating in a transformative educational experience that honed my technical, collaborative and problem-solving skills.

highlights.description: Led the scrum-based development of a cloud-based SaaS solution from scratch to deployment on AWS, making it accessible to users over the internet. Game Night Recommender tool was nominated for the ASU Innovation Showcase event.

Supported student learning as a Grading Specialist and Online Facilitator for a CSE course by assessing assignments, engaging in discussion forums, troubleshooting software, and holding weekly office hours for personalized guidance.
Established a new chapter of GDSC (Google Developer Student Clubs) at the Polytechnic campus to engage students interested in Google technology and Software Development with workshops and projects.

education.title: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science & Engineering
education.description: Where it all began ‚Äî a rigorous program that instilled a deep understanding of computer science fundamentals, programming, and system design, setting a solid foundation for my career.

highlights.description: Awarded the Prof. CNR Rao Merit Seholarship for claiming a spot in the top 20% performers in the CS Department.

Secured a patent for a low-cost portable fetal health monitoring device, developed with a team of 5 students, while serving as a Research Assistant at the Cloud Computing & Big Data Research Center on campus.
Won the runner up place at the Cisco Hackathon for ideating and prototyping a winner predicter system for the Indian Premiere League Cricket tournaments.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: Led key initiatives such as REST API design and implementation, data migration, UI development, system transitions, API and process documentation, and on-boarding mentorship of new recruits, resulting in streamlined processes and increased operational efficiency.

highlights.description: Orchestrated 2 defect-free code releases through meticulous planning and execution, ensuring 100% on-time delivery and flawless production integration.
Mentored 3 new hires through personalized knowledge-transfer sessions and process documentation, reducing the Marketplace Engineering department's onboarding time by 40%.

experience.title: Software Engineer I
experience.description: Developed and implemented scalable features for complex software systems, utilizing agile methodologies and collaborating with cross-functional teams to meet project objectives.

highlights.description: Recognized by the Managing Director for displaying "URGENCY & PERSISTENCE" in my work contributions during Covid-19.

experience.title: Software Intern
experience.description: Developed and documented features, APIs, SQL statements and user interfaces according to business specifications for product management and catalog systems.

activities.company: Cloud Computing & Big Data center, PES University
activities.title: Engineering Research Intern

events.title: ASU Innovation Showcase - Engineering
events.description: Developed a novel personalized game recommendation system integrating Discord and Steam APIs, utilizing user preferences and social connections to suggest multiplayer games for group play.

events.title: ASU Open Door - GDSC Spring Tabling
events.description: Engaged with prospective ASU students & parents, discussing technology and our club, while also leading activities related to hacking the 'Dino Game', Scratch Programming, Web Design and interacting with Bard.

events.title: Intro to Machine Learning - GDSC Workshop
events.description: Organized and promoted a beginner-friendly seminar on Machine Learning, featuring an introduction to TensorFlow and a practical coding session on handwriting recognition, hosted at Arizona State University - Mesa.

skills.overview: With a toolbox filled with advanced programming languages and technologies such as Java, Python, Angular, and React, coupled with deep expertise in cloud computing and data science, I am equipped to tackle complex software challenges. My approach is always guided by the latest in agile practices, continuous integration, and robust testing methodologies to ensure excellence in every project.
